title: ‘Made me want to punch the air’: The Night Manager’s seductive, twisty return was a TV triumph

title: Thailand Election 2026: Youth-linked orange wave propelled a party to win last poll - will history repeat itself?
desc: As Thailand heads into a fragmented and unpredictable election on Sunday (Feb 8), reform has become harder to sell, analysts say. But even without the street protests of the recent past, youth politics continues to shape the electoral race and the ways parties are campaigning.

desc: Each year, KK Women's and Children's Hospital sees up to 400 cases of children with burn injuries.
